body_html: @deepakn94 I haven't tried to get the script to run for me, but another thing to try: when you get to the save point, save the model multiple times; like, 8 times. We can then compare them and see if they're all corrupted identically, or some of them are ok, etc.

body: @deepakn94 I haven't tried to get the script to run for me, but another thing to try: when you get to the save point, save the model multiple times; like, 8 times. We can then compare them and see if they're all corrupted identically, or some of them are ok, etc.
